channel.title: Help magics (delta)
channel.description:
When i hit "ice barrage" It does the barrage bend over thing, and cast, but instead of casting barrage, it casts ice blitz.
HOW DO I CHANGE THIS? I've looked everywhere.
I figure It just needs the GFX changing, but where do i find it and how do i do it? Sorry, just coming back to private servers, kind of a nub.

1979 if gfx code. :] hope that helped.
